SELECT f.feedBackId,u.userName,f.userId,f.question,f.addTime,f.reply,f.answer,f.replyTime FROM t_feedBack f LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON f.userId=u.userId WHERE f.parentId='0'
AND DATE_FORMAT(f.addTime,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(f.addTime,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.endTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND f.answer LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.answer}),'%')
AND u.userName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.name}),'%')
ORDER BY f.addTime DESC

AND f.parentId=#{feedBackId}
